Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Toledo in 1982...
Injured on 8/15/1985 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1986, off Miguel Lopez (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1987, off Scott Mcintyre (DIA)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Coney Island on 4/20/1989...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1989...
Injured on 8/31/1991 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
